title: Add tests for ResolveComReference and cross-AppDomain scenarios
body:
Need regression coverage for https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/6382

- [ ] add a test that exercises COMReference and AppDomains
- [ ] improve the experience of MSBuild central node crashing with Build FAILED 0 errors 0 warnings (throwing in GatherTaskItemOutputs can repro)
- [ ] worker node crashing is a much better experience, but should probably still add verbiage to open an issue at https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/new
